mapper.sql: select a.material_id, a.material_code, a.material_name, a.calculation_unit, c.metering_unit, a.purchaser, a.l_updated, a.l_update_time, a.source_system, a.enable, a.m_category, b.category_code, b.category_name, a.specifications, a.model, a.brand, a.categories_taxes, a.image, a.g_weight, a.n_weight, a.weight, a.volume, a.v_unit, a.abc_attribute, a.avoid_inspect, d.metering_unit as weightName, e.metering_unit as vUnitName from material a LEFT JOIN category b ON a.m_category=b.categoryid LEFT JOIN unit_of_account c on a.calculation_unit=c.unit_id LEFT JOIN unit_of_account d on a.weight=d.unit_id LEFT JOIN unit_of_account e on a.v_unit=e.unit_id ORDER BY a.material_id DESC

mapper.select: SELECT months.Month, COUNT(must_date) AS demandNum FROM (SELECT 1 AS Month UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9 UNION ALL SELECT 10 UNION ALL SELECT 11 UNION ALL SELECT 12) AS months LEFT JOIN material_information ON EXTRACT(MONTH FROM must_date) = months.Month AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM must_date) = '2024' GROUP BY months.Month ORDER BY months.Month

SELECT '待分配' AS demandStatus, COUNT(*) AS count FROM material_information WHERE status = 1 UNION ALL SELECT '已分配' AS demandStatus, COUNT(*) AS count FROM material_information WHERE status = 2 UNION ALL SELECT '已完成' AS demandStatus, COUNT(*) AS count FROM material_information WHERE status = 3 UNION ALL SELECT '已暂挂' AS demandStatus, COUNT(*) AS count FROM material_information WHERE status = 4 UNION ALL SELECT '已作废' AS demandStatus, COUNT(*) AS count FROM material_information WHERE status = 5

SELECT '合同转订单' AS orderSource, COUNT(*) AS oCount FROM order_manager WHERE order_source = 1 UNION ALL SELECT '新建订单' AS orderSource, COUNT(*) AS oCount FROM order_manager WHERE order_source = 2 UNION ALL SELECT '需求转订单' AS orderSource, COUNT(*) AS oCount FROM order_manager WHERE order_source = 3 UNION ALL SELECT '寻源转订单' AS orderSource, COUNT(*) AS oCount FROM order_manager WHERE order_source = 4

SELECT months.Month, COUNT(create_time) AS mCount FROM (SELECT 1 AS Month UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9 UNION ALL SELECT 10 UNION ALL SELECT 11 UNION ALL SELECT 12) AS months LEFT JOIN order_manager ON EXTRACT(MONTH FROM create_time) = months.Month AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM create_time) = '2023' GROUP BY months.Month ORDER BY months.Month

SELECT months.Month, COALESCE(SUM(taxTotal), 0) AS aMoney FROM (SELECT 1 AS Month UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9 UNION ALL SELECT 10 UNION ALL SELECT 11 UNION ALL SELECT 12) AS months LEFT JOIN (SELECT EXTRACT(MONTH FROM requiredDate) AS Month, taxTotal FROM order_execution_details WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM requiredDate) = '2023' ) AS data ON months.Month = data.Month GROUP BY months.Month ORDER BY months.Month
SELECT COUNT(*) AS treatNum from order_execution_details where order_handle=1
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(taxTotal-receivedAmount), 0) AS treatMoney from order_execution_details where order_handle=1
SELECT COUNT(*) AS stopNum from order_execution_details where order_handle=2
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(taxTotal),0) AS completeMoney from order_execution_details where order_handle=2
SELECT COUNT(*) AS applyNum FROM material_requirement
SELECT COUNT(*) AS reconciliationNum FROM order_execution_details WHERE order_quanlity=2
SELECT COUNT(*) AS reconciliationRefuseNum FROM order_execution_details WHERE order_quanlity=2 AND reconciliation_status=5
SELECT count(*) AS orderTotal FROM order_execution_details
SELECT SUM(taxTotal) AS orderTotalAmount FROM order_execution_details
SELECT COUNT(*) as mentNum from contract_management
SELECT COUNT(*) as mentNumNo from contract_management WHERE contractstatus_id=4
SELECT COUNT(*) as inspectTotal FROM order_execution_details where order_handle=2
SELECT COUNT(*) as inspectTotalNo FROM order_execution_details where order_handle=2 AND order_quanlity=1
